original_definition: 'process responsibility structure' means the structure to determine responsibilities and obligations with respect to active power reserves based on the control structure of the synchronous area;
generated_definition: 'process responsibility structure' means a framework that defines the roles and responsibilities of tsos in a synchronous area to ensure a coordinated and efficient process.

Article 3: ‘process responsibility structure’ means the structure to determine responsibilities and obligations with respect to active power reserves based on the control structure of the synchronous area;
‘process responsibility structure’ means the structure to determine responsibilities and obligations with respect toactive power reserves based on the control structure of the synchronous area;
Article 139: a process responsibility structure in accordance with Article 141.

Article 186: information on the process responsibility structure of the synchronous area, including at least information on the processes developed in accordance with Article 140(1) and (2).
